songs.title: 1000 Times
songs.lyrics:
[Snippet]
I was so young and dumb, we were living so loud yeah
Breathin' in the smoke from the gun, I was so young and dumb
It'll never be the same, I stopped counting at
Thousand times, all the lies
To my face, all of the summer nights
You would leave, I would say
(Uh-huh) I love you
